title: Make QueryState::as_nop pub(crate)

labels.name: D-Trivial
labels.description: Nice and easy! A great choice to get started with Bevy

labels.name: C-Code-Quality
labels.description: A section of code that is hard to understand or change

body:
## Rationale

[`QueryState::as_nop`](https://docs.rs/bevy_ecs/0.13.1/bevy_ecs/query/struct.QueryState.html#method.as_nop) is currently only used in two places:
- [`QueryState::is_empty`](https://docs.rs/bevy_ecs/0.13.1/src/bevy_ecs/query/state.rs.html#195-207) (through [`QueryState::is_empty_unsafe_world_cell`](https://docs.rs/bevy_ecs/0.13.1/src/bevy_ecs/query/state.rs.html#216-231))
- [`Query::contains`](https://docs.rs/bevy_ecs/0.13.1/src/bevy_ecs/system/query.rs.html#1478-1486).

[Looking at the method's signature](https://docs.rs/bevy_ecs/0.13.1/src/bevy_ecs/query/state.rs.html#75-79):
```rust
pub fn as_nop(&self) -> &QueryState<NopWorldQuery<D>, F>;
```
It's not really usable by consumers because it returns a non-`mut` reference, while a majority of `QueryState` methods require `&mut self`.

As for the `NopWorldQuery` higher-order WorldQuery, [there are outside users](https://discord.com/channels/691052431525675048/749335865876021248/1222637970612289649) of [that](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/749335865876021248/1222637970369282058/image.png?ex=6616f157&is=66047c57&hm=57d2656ef7615d22af2ad60b48ec5fd17575e50e31d741fe80fd0edc99804129&), so it should be kept public.

## What solution would you like?

Make `as_nop` `pub(crate)`:

```rust
pub(crate) fn as_nop(&self) -> &QueryState<NopWorldQuery<D>, F>;
```

## What alternative(s) have you considered?

Leave it public.

## Additional context

Originally brought up [on discord](https://discord.com/channels/691052431525675048/749335865876021248/1222622654612373535):

Speaking of seemingly weird oversights, QueryState::as_nop renders almost all of QueryState's API unusable, as it returns a &QueryState, while all of QueryState's non-manual methods take &mut self
